scripts.flatten: NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" truffle-flattener src/RuneToken.sol > contracts/RuneToken.sol && truffle-flattener src/MasterChef.sol > contracts/MasterChef.sol && truffle-flattener src/Timelock.sol > contracts/Timelock.sol && truffle-flattener src/runes/El.sol > contracts/runes/El.sol && truffle-flattener src/runes/Eld.sol > contracts/runes/Eld.sol && truffle-flattener src/runes/Tir.sol > contracts/runes/Tir.sol && truffle-flattener src/chefs/ElChef.sol > contracts/chefs/ElChef.sol && truffle-flattener src/chefs/TirChef.sol > contracts/chefs/TirChef.sol && truffle-flattener src/Void.sol > contracts/Void.sol && truffle-flattener src/voids/ElVoid.sol > contracts/voids/ElVoid.sol && truffle-flattener src/voids/EldVoid.sol > contracts/voids/EldVoid.sol && truffle-flattener src/voids/TirVoid.sol > contracts/voids/TirVoid.sol && truffle-flattener src/TokenTimelock.sol > contracts/TokenTimelock.sol
